text: Apple announces a Mac with a touch screen
full-pick-text: Apple announces a Mac with a touch screen. It is an update to an existing notebook. macOS does not radically change to accommodate touch. The product comes with the Apple Polishing Cloth in the box.
notes:
• "It is an update to an existing notebook." (in other words, not a new line like "MacBook Touch")
  • "macOS does not radically change to accommodate touch." (Specifically, the macOS on this machine does not have a custom UI compared to a non-touch Mac.)
  • "The product comes with the Apple Polishing Cloth in the box."
